info.title: FortiOS Monitor
info.description: REST API for configuring FortiOS objects and settings

get.summary:
Retrieve the Service Level Agreement Database downloaded from FortiGuard.
Access Group: netgrp.cfg

schema.title: Health Check FortiGuard Targets
schema.description: List of the Service Level Agreement Database targets downloaded from FortiGuard.

items.title: Health Check FortiGuard
items.description: Service Level Agreement Database target from FortiGuard.

domains.title: Domains List
domains.description: Domains listed under a Health Check FortiGuard target.

items.title: Domain
items.description: Domain under a Health Check FortiGuard Target.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

get.summary:
Retrieve log of SD-WAN interface quality information.
Access Group: netgrp.cfg

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Filter: Only return SLA logs generated since this Unix timestamp.

parameters.name: seconds
parameters.description: Filter: Only return SLA logs generated in the last N seconds.

get.summary:
Retrieve health-check statistics for each SD-WAN link. To be deprecated and replaced by /api/v2/monitor/virtual-wan/sla-log?latest=1&sla=<sla_name> for SLA health metrics 
Access Group: netgrp.cfg

schema.title: SD-WAN Health Check Statistics
schema.description: A map of health check names to their statistics.

additionalProperties.title: Health Check Statistics
additionalProperties.description: A map of interface names to their health check statistics.

additionalProperties.title: Member Statistics
additionalProperties.description: Health check statistics for an SD-WAN member.

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the health check. If the SD-WAN interface is disabled, "disable" will be returned. If the interface does not participate in the health check, "error" will be returned.

packet_sent.title: Packets Sent
packet_sent.description: Number of packets sent for this health check.

packet_received.title: Packets Received
packet_received.description: Number of packets received for this health check.

state_changed.title: Last State Change
state_changed.description: Timestamp of the last link state change, in seconds.

sla_targets_met.title: SLA Targets Met
sla_targets_met.description: A list of SLA targets that are met.

child_intfs.title: Child Interface Health Check Statistics
child_intfs.description: A map of child interface names to their health check statistics. This is applicable for shortcut tunnels created by ADVPN interfaces.

additionalProperties.title: Child Interface Statistics
additionalProperties.description: Health check statistics for a child interface.

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of the health check. If the SD-WAN interface is disabled, "disable" will be returned. If the interface does not participate in the health check, "error" will be returned.

packet_sent.title: Packets Sent
packet_sent.description: Number of packets sent for this health check.

packet_received.title: Packets Received
packet_received.description: Number of packets received for this health check.

state_changed.title: Last State Change
state_changed.description: Timestamp of the last link state change, in seconds.

sla_targets_met.title: SLA Targets Met
sla_targets_met.description: A list of SLA targets that are met.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: health_check_name
parameters.description: Health check name. If not provided, will return results of all health checks.

get.summary:
Retrieve logs of SLA probe results for the specified SD-WAN SLA or health check name.
Access Group: netgrp.cfg

items.title: Health Check Entry
items.description: SLA results for one health check of one interface.

logs.title: SLA Logs
logs.description: A list of health check measurement results.

items.title: SLA Log Entry
items.description: Result of a health check measurement.

sla_targets_met.title: SLA Targets Met
sla_targets_met.description: A list of SLA targets that are met.

child_intfs.title: Child Interface SLA Logs Mapping
child_intfs.description: A map of child interface names to their SLA logs. This is applicable for shortcut tunnels created by ADVPN interfaces.

additionalProperties.title: Child Interface SLA Logs
additionalProperties.description: A list of health check measurement results.

items.title: Child Interface SLA Log Entry
items.description: Result of a health check measurement.

sla_targets_met.title: Child Interface SLA Targets Met
sla_targets_met.description: A list of SLA targets that are met.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Filter: Only return SLA logs generated since this Unix timestamp.

parameters.name: seconds
parameters.description: Filter: Only return SLA logs generated in the last N seconds.

parameters.name: latest
parameters.description: If set, will only return the latest log, in the meantime, since, seconds, or sampling_interval will be ignored.

parameters.name: min_sample_interval
parameters.description: Minimum seconds between kept log samples. Returned samples may not be evenly spaced (default: 5).

parameters.name: skip_vpn_child
parameters.description: If set, will skip all VPN child interfaces.

parameters.name: include_sla_targets_met
parameters.description: If set, will return SLA targets that are met. Can only be used when "latest" is set.

get.summary:
Retrieve interface statistics for each SD-WAN link.
Access Group: netgrp.cfg

schema.title: SD-WAN Member Statistics List
schema.description: A list of SD-WAN members and their traffic statistics.

interface.title: Interface
interface.description: The interface name of the SD-WAN member.

seq_num.title: Sequence Number
seq_num.description: The sequence number of an SD-WAN member.

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of traffic monitoring. If this value is present, traffic monitoring is not enabled and other statistics will be absent.

link.title: Link Status
link.description: Interface link status for the SD-WAN member.

session.title: Session Count
session.description: Session count for the SD-WAN member.

tx_bytes.title: Bytes Sent
tx_bytes.description: Amount of data transmitted by the SD-WAN member, in bytes.

rx_bytes.title: Bytes Received
rx_bytes.description: Amount of data received by the SD-WAN member, in bytes.

tx_bandwidth.title: Upload Bandwidth
tx_bandwidth.description: Upload bandwidth of the SD-WAN member, in bits per second.

rx_bandwidth.title: Download Bandwidth
rx_bandwidth.description: Download bandwidth of the SD-WAN member, in bits per second.

state_changed.title: Last State Change
state_changed.description: Timestamp of the last link state change, in seconds.

child_intfs.title: Child Interface
child_intfs.description: The dynamic tunnel of the SD-WAN member.

additionalProperties.title: Child Member Statistics
additionalProperties.description: Traffic statistics for an SD-WAN member.

status.title: Status
status.description: Status of traffic monitoring. If this value is present, traffic monitoring is not enabled and other statistics will be absent.

link.title: Link Status
link.description: Interface link status for the SD-WAN member.

session.title: Session Count
session.description: Session count for the SD-WAN member.

tx_bytes.title: Bytes Sent
tx_bytes.description: Amount of data transmitted by the SD-WAN member, in bytes.

rx_bytes.title: Bytes Received
rx_bytes.description: Amount of data received by the SD-WAN member, in bytes.

tx_bandwidth.title: Upload Bandwidth
tx_bandwidth.description: Upload bandwidth of the SD-WAN member, in bits per second.

rx_bandwidth.title: Download Bandwidth
rx_bandwidth.description: Download bandwidth of the SD-WAN member, in bits per second.

state_changed.title: Last State Change
state_changed.description: Timestamp of the last link state change, in seconds.

400.description: Bad Request: Request cannot be processed by the API

401.description: Not Authorized: Request without successful login session

403.description: Forbidden: Request is missing CSRF token or administrator is missing access profile permissions.

404.description: Resource Not Found: Unable to find the specified resource.

405.description: Method Not Allowed: Specified HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

413.description: Request Entity Too Large: Request cannot be processed due to large entity

424.description: Failed Dependency: Fail dependency can be duplicate resource, missing required parameter, missing required attribute, invalid attribute value

429.description: Access temporarily blocked: Maximum failed authentications reached. The offended source is temporarily blocked for certain amount of time.

500.description: Internal Server Error: Internal error when processing the request

parameters.name: interface
parameters.description: Interface name. "interface" param take precedence over "zone" or "sla". If set, will return only return the member that matches the interface.

parameters.name: interface
parameters.description: Interface names. "interface" param take precedence over "zone" or "sla". If set, will return only return the members that matches the interfaces.

parameters.name: zone
parameters.description: SD-WAN zone name. "zone" param take precedence over "sla". If set, will only return members of the zone.

parameters.name: sla
parameters.description: SLA name. If set, will only return members that are participants of the SLA.

parameters.name: skip_vpn_child
parameters.description: If set, will skip all VPN child interfaces.
